Question: Are you experiencing new or worsening symptoms?
Description: Select all the symptoms you have right now. If you don't have any of these symptoms, select "none of the above."
lossOfSmellTaste: Loss or change of sense of smell or taste
diarrhea: Diarrhea - For example, having loose or watery stool that is not normal for you.
bodyAches: Body or muscle aches - For example, aches or pains in your body that you don't normally have.
